mapper.select: SELECT distinct c.id, c.title, c.spend_time, c.likes, c.views, c.ability, c.thumb, c.created_at, c.created_by, u.id as user_id, u.nickname FROM contents c JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.id and c.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY c.id DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT distinct b.id, b.content, b.category, b.likes, b.views, b.comments, b.created_at, b.created_by, u.id as user_id, u.nickname as writer FROM board b JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.id and u.id = #{userId} ORDER BY b.id DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT distinct c.id, c.title, c.spend_time, c.likes, c.views, c.ability, c.thumb, c.created_at, c.created_by, u.id as user_id, u.nickname FROM contents c JOIN favorite_contents fc ON c.id = fc.contents_id and fc.user_id = #{userId} JOIN user u ON fc.user_id = u.id ORDER BY c.id DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT distinct b.id, b.content, b.category, b.likes, b.views, b.comments, b.created_at, b.created_by, u.id as user_id, u.nickname as writer FROM board b JOIN board_comment bc ON b.id = bc.board_id JOIN user u ON bc.user_id = u.id and u.id= #{userId} ORDER BY b.id DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{offset};
